articles.description: MOSCOW: A trio of Russian and American space travelers launched successfully and reached the International Space Station on Friday. NASA astronaut Mark Vande Hei and Russian cosmonauts Oleg Novitskiy and Pyotr Dubrov blasted off as scheduled at 12:42 p.m. (07…

articles.title: Fossil of 'skunk' that lived among dinosaurs unearthed in Patagonia - The Straits Times
